observation.output:
Here's the result of running `cat -n` on /tmp/tmp_qu0p03y/astropy/tox.ini:
     1	[tox]
     2	envlist =
     3	    py{38,39,310,311,dev}-test{,-image,-recdeps,-alldeps,-oldestdeps,-devdeps,-devinfra,-predeps,-numpy120,-numpy121,-numpy122,-numpy123,-mpl311}{,-cov}{,-clocale}
     4	    build_docs
     5	    linkcheck
     6	    codestyle
     7	requires =
     8	    setuptools >= 30.3.0
     9	    pip >= 19.3.1
    10	    tox-pypi-filter >= 0.12
    11	isolated_build = true
    12	
    13	[testenv]
    14	
    15	# The following option combined with the use of the tox-pypi-filter above allows
    16	# project-wide pinning of dependencies, e.g. if new versions of pytest do not
    17	# work correctly with pytest-astropy plugins. Most of the time the pinnings file
    18	# should be empty.
    19	pypi_filter = https://raw.githubusercontent.com/astropy/ci-helpers/main/pip_pinnings.txt
    20	
    21	# Pass through the following environment variables which are needed for the CI
    22	passenv = HOME WINDIR LC_ALL LC_CTYPE CC CI IS_CRON ARCH_ON_CI
    23	
    24	setenv =
    25	    # For coverage, we need to pass extra options to the C compiler
    26	    cov: CFLAGS = --coverage -fno-inline-functions -O0
    27	    image: MPLFLAGS = -m "mpl_image_compare" --mpl --mpl-generate-summary=html --mpl-results-path={toxinidir}/results --mpl-hash-library={toxinidir}/astropy/tests/figures/{envname}.json --mpl-baseline-path=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/astropy/astropy-figure-tests/astropy-main/figures/{envname}/ --remote-data -W ignore::DeprecationWarning
    28	    !image: MPLFLAGS =
    29	    clocale: LC_CTYPE = C.ascii
    30	    clocale: LC_ALL = C
